title: Air France-KLM
description: Air France-KLM utilizes a color palette primarily featuring 'FF1E27' (a vibrant red), along with 'FFFFFF' (white) and '000000' (black), symbolizing sophistication, dynamism, and elegance. These brand colors are corroborated by the brand's official presence at http://airfranceklm.com and are documented through brandfetch.com.
